entry.title: New FurSquared 2024 schedule released (1.5)
entry.summary:
A new FurSquared 2024 schedule has been released!

Headless Lounge (Founders)
No longer open on Thursday

Headless Lounge (Both)
Fri and Sat:
9:00 AM - 2:00 AM
Sunday: 9:00 AM - 12:00 AM

Sponsor's Lounge should be "Con Suite" according to Gazzy - it is such on everything else as well. :3

Added
"Zoo &" into the name

Con Suite Hours are the same as the Zoo Hours

Hours:
Thursday: 4 pm - 7 pm
Friday: 10:30 am - 8 pm
Saturday: 10:30 am - 4 pm
Sunday: 10:30 am - 3 pm

Iron Artist
7:00 PM - 8:00 PM

We had to move some sessions, so if you were planning on seeing them, check their new dates or locations:

  • “Zoo & Con Suite” by Gazzy, Konnor Unuki (Feb. 24, 2024, 8 a.m. → Feb. 24, 2024, 10:30 a.m.)
  • “Iron Fursuit” (Feb. 23, 2024, 7:30 p.m. → Feb. 23, 2024, 7 p.m.)
  • “Zoo & Con Suite” by Gazzy, Konnor Unuki (Feb. 25, 2024, 8 a.m. → Feb. 25, 2024, 10:30 a.m.)

entry.title: New FurSquared 2024 schedule released (1.4)
entry.summary:
A new FurSquared 2024 schedule has been released!

Moved "So You Want to Be a Con Artist" due to speaker overlap

We have moved a session around: “So You Want to be a Con Artist” by Bash the Piñata (Feb. 24, 2024, 6:30 p.m., Mitchell → Feb. 24, 2024, 4 p.m., Schlitz).

entry.title: New FurSquared 2024 schedule released (1.3)
entry.summary:
A new FurSquared 2024 schedule has been released!

Replaced "Complete History of [...]" with "Iron Fursuit".
Removed "Alternatives to D&D"
Moved "Darkglow Fitness" and "Hip Hop Dance Meet"
Updated description for "Kaiju and the Furry Fandom"

We had to move some sessions, so if you were planning on seeing them, check their new dates or locations:

  • “Darkglow Fitness!” by Ziggy Darkglow, Catboyxei (Feb. 25, 2024, 9 a.m. → Feb. 23, 2024, 9 a.m.)
  • “Hip Hop Dance Meet (18+)” by Shiori (Feb. 22, 2024, 6 p.m. → Feb. 22, 2024, 9 p.m.)

entry.title: New FurSquared 2024 schedule released (1.2)
entry.summary:
A new FurSquared 2024 schedule has been released!

Changed track name from "Main Event" to "Featured."

entry.title: New FurSquared 2024 schedule released (1.1)
entry.summary:
A new FurSquared 2024 schedule has been released!

added Saturday concert block sound check

We have a new session: “Concert Block Sound Check” by FurSquared Staff .

entry.title: New FurSquared 2024 schedule released (1.0)
entry.summary:
The first FurSquared 2024 schedule has been released!

We released our first schedule!
